frontmatter.title: Powermock with JUnit 4 to Test Spring+Hibernate Architecture
frontmatter.description: I've been working on developing this webapp project. Basically, we break the logical parts of the code into entity layer, service layer and UI layer. The data structure is not that complex, so we thought that we use Hibernate ORM to do its magic. All the plumbing works between these layers were managed via Spring dependency injection.

frontmatter.title: Website development (or any software development), how easy is that?
frontmatter.description: I think there are still lots of people who's misjudged on how easy to develop a piece of software including developing a website.

frontmatter.title: Why you should consider OS X?
frontmatter.description: Back in early 2008, I made a very bold decision to move from Windows to OSX and I must say, I am very happy that I made this transition. Some of the reasons that you might consider to switch to OSX (especially if you've been using Windows).
